application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted Details of enhanced sound insulation value of at least 5dB above the minimum Building Regulations value in pursuant to condition 8 of planning permission 224188PANDF dated 24/11/2022, are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with Policies Standard 30 of the Housing SPG and Policy 7.15 of the London Plan 2021.
description: Details of enhanced sound insulation value of at least 5dB above the minimum Building Regulations value in pursuant to condition 8 of planning permission 224188PANDF dated 24/11/2022 for: Construction of additional storey extension to accommodate 9no. self-contained residential units, of which 8 are one bed and one is two bed; provision of associated cycle storage, refuse  and recycling storage  (Prior Approval Application, under Part 20, Class A)
